original_text: It is impossible for those who have once been enlightened, who have tasted the heavenly gift, who have shared in the Holy Spirit,
korean_text: 한 번 빛을 받고 하늘의 은사를 맛보고 성령에 참여한 바 되고

sentences.original_text: It is impossible for those who have once been enlightened
who have tasted the heavenly gift
who have shared in the Holy Spirit
